page.title: 05 RECREATION
page.content: If we wanted to go to the theatre we would have to go by private transport, the nearest places being York, Harrogate,Leeds and Richmond.It would be the same if we wanted to see a film because Ripon cinema has now closed down. There is no Leisure Centre near us either but we can go swimming at Ripon Spa Baths.If we want to play badminton or squash, roller skating or ice skating we have to go as far as Billingham which is in Cleveland. There is a bowling green, a golf course, a rugby club and a race course in Ripon.But if we wanted to watch a football match we would have to go to York. We can play football and cricket in North Stainley.
